entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
